name: answer_count
description: Count of answers to a question.

name: answer_id
description: ID of answer.

name: answer_status
description: Status of the answer (accepted/not_accepted).

name: author
description: Stackexchange username of the author.

name: author_bot
description: True/False if the given author is a bot or not.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender.

name: author_gender_acc
description: Accuracy to assess author gender.

name: author_id
description: Author Id from SortingHat.

name: author_link
description: URL to Stackexchange profile of the author.

name: author_name
description: Author name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_org_name
description: Author's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_reputation
description: Author's reputation on Stackexchange.

name: author_user_name
description: Author's username from SortingHat profile.

name: author_uuid
description: Author profile unique identifier.

name: comment_count
description: Number of comments.

name: creation_date
description: Date when the item was created.

name: delete_vote_count
description: Number of votes recommending to delete an item.

name: down_vote_count
description: Number of downvotes on an item.

name: favorite_count
description: Number of users who have bookmarked/favourited an item.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Date when the item was created.

name: is_accepted
description: Check if item is accepted.

name: is_accepted_answer
description: Check if item is accepted answer.

name: is_stackexchange_answer
description: Check if an item is Stackexchange answer.

name: is_stackexchange_question
description: Check if an item is Stackexchange question.

name: item_id
description: ID of an item according to Stackexchange

name: last_activity_date
description: Unix time of last activity of the item.

name: link
description: URL of the item.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched and stored in the index with enriched documents.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was retrieved from the original data source and stored in the index with raw documents.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the item was retrieved from.

name: owner_bot
description: True if the given item owner is identified as a bot.

name: owner_gender
description: Item owner gender.

name: owner_gender_acc
description: Accuracy of the item owner gender.

name: owner_id
description: Item owner Id from SortingHat.

name: owner_name
description: Item owner name

name: owner_org_name
description: Organization the item owner belongs to.

name: owner_user_name
description: Item owner user name.

name: owner_uuid
description: Item owner unique identifier from SortingHat.

name: project
description: Project name as defined in the JSON file where repositories are grouped by project.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: question_accepted_answer_id
description: ID of the accepted answer to a question. None if no answer is accepted.

name: question_has_accepted_answer
description: Check if a question has an accepted answer.

name: question_id
description: ID of a question.

name: question_tags
description: Words or phrases that a question is tagged with.

name: question_title
description: Title of the question.

name: score
description: Score of an item.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: tags
description: Words or phrases that an item is tagged with.

name: thread_tags
description: Words or phrases that a thread is tagged with.

name: title
description: Title of the item (question).

name: title_analyzed
description: Question title split by terms to allow searching.

name: type
description: Type of the item (answer, question).

name: up_vote_count
description: Number of upvotes on an item.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.

name: view_count
description: Count of views for the item.
